name: R4-codesystem-content-mode-for-R3
title: Cross-version VS for R4.CodeSystemContentMode for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/codesystem-content-mode|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R3.
